TopicTitle: Magical Appearing Kerbals on the Main Screen!?

Articles.Content:
So..... I was starting up KSP today, of course it did its usual loading screen blah blah. I get to the main screen and I see..... well just look for yourself.

Does anyone know what mod added this O.o

Javascript is disabled. View full album
It's a gag that Blizzy put into Toolbar.
Ohhh, ok haha. I did a double take xD
